title: 98/311/EC: Council Decision of 1 May 1998 abrogating the Decision on the existence of an excessive deficit for Italy
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 1 May 1998 abrogating the Decision on the existence of an excessive deficit for Italy (98/311/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: From an overall assessment it follows that the excessive deficit situation in Italy has been corrected.
The Council Decision of 26 September 1994 on the existence of an excessive deficit in Italy is hereby abrogated.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 1 May 1998.
For the Council
The President
G. BROWN
(1) OJ L 332, 31. 12. 1993, p. 7.
(2) Council recommendations of 7 November 1994, 24 July 1995, 16 September 1996 and 15 September 1997.
